titleStmt.title: A True relation, of the life & death of Sarah Beckwith, daughter of Marmaduke and Elizabeth Beckwith, of Audbrough near Massham in York-shire; who in about the twentieth year of her age departed this life, the 24th. day of the 9th. month, 1691.
titleStmt.author: Beckwith, Hannah.
Beckwith, Marmaduke.
Beckwith, Elizabeth.

notesStmt.note: Page 11 signed: Hannah Beckwith; p. 37 signed: Marmaduke & Elizabeth Beckwith.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London.
